title: How to Find the Right Business Coach
sub_head: Consider why you want a coach in the first place, and look for someone who specializes in that area
body:
Clate Mask (@clatemask) is the founder and CEO of Keap, a maker of sales and marketing automation software for small businesses. He also is co-author of “Conquer the Chaos: How to Grow a Successful Small Business Without Going Crazy.”
I recently shared an article about how to get the most out of a business coach. The response was overwhelmingly positive, but many people wrote in asking how to find a good coach.
